name: Extract NYC 311 Service Request Template
description: Extract NYC 311 Service Requests to a destination table on Google BigQuery

parameters.name: mode
parameters.label: Extraction mode
parameters.helpText: snapshot = refresh all the data / increment = daily increment load

parameters.name: nyc_opendata_apikey
parameters.label: NYC Open Data API Key
parameters.helpText: API key for accessing NYC Open Data

parameters.name: dest_table
parameters.label: Destination table name
parameters.helpText: Destination table name on Google BigQuery
